personal.name: Sandy Krish
personal.title: Specialist Programmer / Frontend Developer
personal.bio: Passionate frontend developer with expertise in Vue js, React, Next.js, and modern web technologies. I love creating beautiful, responsive, and user-friendly web applications.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with React and Node.js, featuring user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.
projects.longDescription: This comprehensive e-commerce solution includes features like product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, payment integration with Stripe, order management, and an admin dashboard for inventory management.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.
projects.longDescription: Built with React and Firebase, this app allows teams to create projects, assign tasks, track progress, and collaborate in real-time. Features include drag-and-drop task boards, file attachments, comments, and notifications.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard that displays current weather conditions and forecasts for multiple cities with beautiful visualizations.
projects.longDescription: This weather application uses the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch real-time weather data and displays it with interactive charts and maps. Features include location-based weather, 7-day forecasts, and weather alerts.

experience.description: Developing and maintaining responsive web applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Collaborating with design and backend teams to deliver high-quality user experiences.
achievements: Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization and lazy loading
Led the migration from JavaScript to TypeScript across 5 major projects
Implemented automated testing suite reducing bugs by 60%
Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews

experience.description: Worked on client projects building responsive websites and web applications. Gained experience in modern frontend technologies and agile development practices.
achievements: Successfully delivered 8 client projects on time and within budget
Improved website loading speeds by 25% through image optimization
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI components
Participated in daily standups and sprint planning meetings

experience.description: Assisted in developing the company's main product interface. Learned modern development practices and contributed to feature development under senior developer guidance.
achievements: Built 5 reusable React components used across the application
Fixed 20+ UI bugs and improved user experience
Participated in user testing sessions and implemented feedback
Learned Git workflow and collaborative development practices

education.description: Comprehensive computer science education with focus on software development and modern web technologies.
